title.narrative: Rural Finance Sector Development Cluster Program (Subprogram 2)

description.narrative: The Program is the second of two subprograms under the Cluster Program. The objective of the Program is to improve the soundness, efficiency, and outreach of the Borrower's rural finance sector through policy, legal, regulatory and institutional reform.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Inclusive rural finance system that is more sound and efficient, and has wider outreach.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Credit outreach of Small Farmers Development Bank (SFDB) increases from 140,000 accounts in 2008 to 360,000 accounts (of which 60% are women) by the end of 2013.

description.narrative: Inclusive rural finance system that is more sound and efficient, and has wider outreach.

title.narrative: Credit outreach of Agricultural Development Bank Limited (ADBL) increases from 200,000 accounts in January 2010 to 250,000 accounts (of which 20% are women) by 2012.

description.narrative: Inclusive rural finance system that is more sound and efficient, and has wider outreach.

title.narrative: Pending cases at the Debt Recovery Tribunal (DRT) reduced from 830 in 2008 to 530 by end 2012.

description.narrative: Inclusive rural finance system that is more sound and efficient, and has wider outreach.
